version_description:
- Release new Campaign: Zone 5 & Zone 6
- Release new Challenge Mode: Raid
- Update new logic in Survival Mode: always start at the beginning of time stage
- Costumes can be bought by Platinum

- Release new Fighters: Nemesis
- Release new Nala and Nemesis costumes
- Release new themes Mid-Autumn Festival of Costume: Crimson Moon & Jade Warrior
- Release new themes Mid-Autumn Festival of Drone
- Release new Event: Bingo, 7-day Challenges
- Release new Function: Auto Mode
- Support new language ingame: Korean, Russian, Japanese, Filipino
- Optimize and balance the game

- Open Skip Tutorial function
- Release new item: Random Fragment
- Release 2 new events for newbie: Rookie Process & Golden Week
- Release 4 new limited events
- Release 2 new costumes: Inferno Sport & Space Mech Czerno
- Release new special Drone which can get from the Golden Week Event
- Update new amazing VFX of Nala's Skills
- Optimize and balance the game

- Release new functions:
+ Revolution System
+ Rename System
- New Energy Shop
- Release new Drones:
+ 1 Halloween Drones
+ 6 Special Drones
- Release many new themes of Costumes.
- Release 3 new Limited Events.
- Update the new UI of Item previews.
- Optimize and balance the game.

- Adding the level of equipment, updating the parameters corresponding to the level of equipment
- Fix some bugs and optimize the game

- Adding the level of equipment, updating the parameters corresponding to the level of equipment
- Fix some bugs and optimize the game

[Next patch]
- New Drone: Cyber Santa
- New event Token: Star
- Fix some Event's bug
- Rebalance VIP point of Mighty Squad's pack
- Fix Auto mode and Rent Shop sometime don't contain VIP point
- Fix some localize bug
- Optimize and balance game

- Fix Survival Save/ Load bug
- Fix some Event's bug
- Optimize and balance game

- Increase profit of Investment Packages
- Rebalance, increase profit and adding more bonus level to Growth Fund 1 & 2
- Optimize and balance game
- Fix some minor bugs
